Title
The Castle of Otranto
Author
Horace Walpole
Year
1764
Form
Novel
Genre
Gothic
Genre (standardized)
Gothic
Location
UK
Language
English
General Notes
Original edition claimed to be an Italian translation. Title page reads: 'Translated by William Marshal, Gent. from the original Italian of Onuphrio Muralto'. The Translator's Preface reads: 'The following work was founded in the library of an ancient Catholic family in the north of England. It was printed at Naples, in the black letter, in the year 1529.'
Publication Data
  Title: "The Castle of Otranto"
  Publication Location: London
 Publisher:  Tho. Lownds  
 Publication Format: 8vo
 Engravings: true
 Number of pages: 210
